item.title: refactor in R
item.description: I use this little R function almost daily.Â It just takes a factor, drops the unused levels, and otherwise keeps the same ordering. refactor <- function(x) { x <- factor(x, levels=levels(x)[levels(x) %in% x] ) return(x) } File this under “commands that should be included in R.”
